FROM user_dietary_goals WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND end_date > CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_dietary_goals WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT g.* FROM user_dietary_goals g JOIN ( SELECT udr.user_id, SUM(CASE WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'protein' THEN n.protein * udr.portion_size WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'fat' THEN n.fat * udr.portion_size WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'carb' THEN n.carbohydrate * udr.portion_size WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'fiber' THEN n.fiber_dietary * udr.portion_size END) as actual_intake FROM user_diet_records udr JOIN nutrition n ON udr.food_id = n.food_id WHERE DATE(udr.meal_time) = CURDATE() GROUP BY udr.user_id ) actual ON g.user_id = actual.user_id WHERE CASE WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'protein' THEN actual.actual_intake >= g.target_protein * #{achievementRate} WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'fat' THEN actual.actual_intake >= g.target_fat * #{achievementRate} WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'carb' THEN actual.actual_intake >= g.target_carb * #{achievementRate} WHEN #{nutrientType} = 'fiber' THEN actual.actual_intake >= g.target_fiber * #{achievementRate} END
